short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know who is accepting/taking apple pay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this extension, you may freely browse the website without being prompted to pay to stop being monitored by cookies.

Apple Pay is one of the famous digital payment method. Using this extension you can find which shops and brands accepting apple pay.

This will make your shopping very easy if you are using apple pay.

Disclaimer: This is an independent project developed by takeapplepayzone. and has no relationship to apple pay app.
